name: Travel and Treasures
description:
Get the great treasure that awaits in the bowels of the ruins on the mountain, but try not to die in the attempt.

You will only have 3 lives to overcome the 10 levels that this title contains.
Without check points, or a save system, try to overcome the challenges that each level proposes to reach the treasure that is at the end of the route.

Travel and Treasures is a classic and simple platform game, the player can run and jump to overcome every trap in his path.

The levels are quite short, but at each step they will present traps that will stop the player. Traps that, with some patience can be mastered to overcome them without any problem.
